TunableList.name: UNAFFORDABLE_TOOLTIPS
TunableList.description: A mapping of tooltips for each of the funds sources when an interaction cannot be performed due to lack of such funds. Each tooltip takes the same tokens as the interaction.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The tooltip to display when a Sim cannot run the specified interaction due to lack of funds.

Tunable.name: MAX_FUNDS
Tunable.description: Max Funds a household can have. If this is tuned please update GlobalTunables.as in the UI code. There is a constant there that matches this value and will need to be updated if we ever retune this value.
